raw_comment:
I notice that the Women’s basketball league says it is from 2019. 
I wonder why managers are shown in baseball instead of the colored head coaches. I noticed that the head coaches of color had the highest percentage in soccer. I wonder what the numbers would look like this year because of Covid. I notice that the percentages for colored coaching is the lowest in the football category. I wonder why there is not a bar graph for the Women’s Basketball League for the year of 2020. I notice that there is a higher number of players of color over the coaches in all categories. I wonder why there are more colored players rather than coaches.
ace_sentences: The Women's basketball league data is from 2019.
I wonder why the chart shows managers in baseball.
I wonder why the chart does not show head coaches of color in baseball.
The percentage of head coaches of color is highest in soccer.
I wonder what the numbers would be in this year because of Covid.
The percentage of coaches of color is lowest in football.
I wonder why there is no bar graph for the Women's basketball league for 2020.
In all categories, the number of players of color is higher than the number of coaches of color.
I wonder why there are more players of color than coaches of color.
